insert into member_error_ht (id, name, level_name, level_num, phone, sex, balance_amount, balance_giftmoney_amount, consume_count, balance_integral, last_consume_time, store_id) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.levelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.balanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.balanceGiftmoneyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.consumeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.balanceIntegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.lastConsumeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, NAME, level_name, level_num, phone, sex, balance_amount, balance_giftmoney_amount, consume_count, balance_integral, FROM_UNIXTIME(last_consume_time) as last_consume_time, store_id from member_error_ht where store_id = #{storeId}
select sum(balance_amount) as balanceAmounts from member_error_ht where store_id = #{storeId} and is_deleted = 0
